title: Is it going to be darker tonight in 500 years?
subtitle: An article in 2010 on the forthcoming event of "The Night of Darkness in 500 Years" and the Moon eclipse was circulated as a new one in 2014 and again in 2016.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "The Night of Darkness in 500 Years" will be held on December 20, 2016 because of the eclipse of the Moon.
